text: Bhanwar Lal Sharma (17 April 1945 â€“ 9 October 2022) was an Indian politician and businessman. He was born in Rajasthan, India. Sharma was a member of the Rajasthan Legislative Assembly from 1985 to 1993, 1996 to 2008 and incumbent from 2013. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Rajasthani politicians Category:Indian businesspeople
title: Bhanwar Lal Sharma
